properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 8 at 3:33AM PST until January 9 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7
inches.

* WHERE...Elevations above 3000 feet in Western Siskiyou County,
including Highway 3 south of Callahan and Sawyers Bar Road
west of Etna.

* WHEN...From 6 PM Wednesday to 6 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Slippery snow covered roads and reduced visibility
will cause hazardous travel conditions.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
* Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination.

* Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and
limited visibilities.

* See http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for latest road conditions.

* A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow
will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET
